      • arcade

        public void arcade(double speed,
                   double rotation)
        Description copied from interface: DriveTrainInterface
        Operate the robot with an arcade control.
        Specified by:
        arcade in interface DriveTrainInterface
        Parameters:
        speed - The speed to drive at from -1 to 1 inclusive. Positive speed is forward.
        rotation - The rotation to drive at from -1 to 1 inclusive. Positive rotation is right/clockwise.

      • tank

        public void tank(double left,

        Description copied from interface: DriveTrainInterface
        Operate the robot with a tank control. Positive speeds are forward.
        Specified by:
        tank in interface DriveTrainInterface
        Parameters:
        left - The speed to drive the left train at.
        right - The speed to drive the right train at.
